title: Launch Button is Failing Me (I think)
body: 6 weeks. 6 weeks is how long my League of Legends has not been working and it's been driving me nuts. My "Launch" button ( which I am assuming is the problem) won't open the log in screen and I am on the edge of breaking apart because I lost my Forsaken Jayce because my League didn't work and I've tried alot of stuff. I tried everything on this >https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues and I don't know what to do. HELP!

replies.body:
Hi AceOfBlades,

That sounds pretty weird.  I'd definitely suggest you get in touch with the Player Support team if you haven't already.

The article you linked is on the right track, but if it doesn't work, You could also try out [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  Failing that, I'd say the next step would be to do a complete reinstall - [instructions here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

Let me know how you go.

Mindstar

> The article you linked is on the right track, but if it doesn't work, You could also try out [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  Failing that, I'd say the next step would be to do a complete reinstall - [instructions here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

I have reinstalled, but I'll look up the Troubleshooting Connection issues and message the Player Support team. Thanks!
